scripts.dev: concurrently --prefix "[{name}]" --names "VUE,FASTAPI" --prefix-colors "blue,yellow" "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "cd backend && .\venv\Scripts\python -m uvicorn main:app --reload"
scripts.dev:mac: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && fastapi dev main.py"
scripts.dev:debug: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "cd backend && .\venv\Scripts\python -m uvicorn main:app --reload > backend_log.txt 2>&1"
